cop2.speaker: Copper Holmes
cop2.text: Alright Rookie, listen up. We raided a suspected drug operation.

cop2.speaker: Copper Holmes

cop2.text: Your job? Figure out which one of these squeakers was the *seller*. Look around, talk to everyone. Got it?

cop2.speaker: Copper Holmes
cop2.text: Need some pointers on how things work around here, Detective?

cop2.text: Check the evidence on the table first. Inspect items closely, sometimes details hide in plain sight. Then talk to the suspects.

options.text: Sounds boring. I'm gonna solve a *real* crime.

cop2.speaker: Copper Holmes
